titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing special awards to World War I and World War II veterans of the United States Navy Armed Guard.
A joint resolution authorizing special awards to World War I and World War II veterans of the United States Navy Armed Guard.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Authorizes and urges the President to make appropriate awards to recognize the service of members of the United States Navy Armed Guard during World War I or II as service in a special force or military organization of the United States Navy.
